text: David Ian Hewlett (18 April 1968) He is an English-Canadian actor, writer and director. He is best known for his role as Dr. Meredith Rodney McKay on the science fiction TV shows Stargate SG-1, Stargate Atlantis and Stargate Universe. Hewlett was born in Redhill, Surrey, UK. He moved to Canada when he was a child. ==Other websites== * Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:English movie actors Category:English movie directors Category:English television actors Category:Canadian movie actors Category:Canadian television actors Category:Canadian movie directors Category:Actors from Surrey
title: David Hewlett
